question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country. Write a letter to your manager, In your letter explain why you want to work in the company's head office for six months say how your work could be done while you are away ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I am writing this letter in connection to the training course which might useful for our future. Recently, I noticed the French language course in the newspaper.

I already shown my compel to learn French language. This training course is for short term and classes will be on weekends. This course is especially designed for intermediate candidate. accordingly , I think I am preferct fit for yearly nomination under talent schemes of our organization. I comprehend the depandancy of myself, therefore I already discussed with anuj to take care of the work during my absence. however, I will be available over call in case of any emergency. we all are working in a call centre and organization is looking for Candidate with excellent skill in French language to deal with the french speaking customer. Hence I would like to nominate myself and ensure you that I Will pass the level 2 exam with flying colour as this will also cut short the expense of the translater to handle the french cilent.
I looking forward to hear from you.
